page.title: 19OCCUPATIONS IN TREGONY
page.content: The largest group of people in the village is the retired.There are very few unemployed people.Most people either work for E.C.C.or are self-employed artisans.Service industry constitutes the second largest employer with health service workers and others working in shops and offices, mainly in Truro.There are a few farm workers but it is not a very significant source of employment considering Tregony is in the centre of a farming community. Currently jobs are very difficult to find, especially for school leavers, so that there is quite a high proportion of students studying at the St.Austell Sixth Form College or the Mid Cornwall College of Further Education.
